name: Into the Abyss
description:
A 1st-person survival horror game. Explore and find your way through horrific environments. Find clues and solve puzzles to advance.



Synopsis:



In the remote mountains of Overhall County, you take the role of a man who is trying to find his sister who has recently gone missing after her car broke down. You arrive at her location 2 days after her disappearance. You quickly realize these woods might be haunted or is there something else at play? You must find your way through this hell in the woods to find your sister and bring her home. Running might be the best way to stay alive.



Features:



True Survival Horror Experience: You are no fighter - if you want to survive the horrors of the woods, your only chance is to run.



Unpredictable Events: Players won't know what's next.



Inspired Horror: Into the Abyss’s setting and characters are inspired by many great horror films, all coming together as one. (With a touch of originality.)



Warning:



This game features jump scares, extreme gore, nudity, drugs, dark environments, and flashing lights.
